title-group.article-title: Corrigendum: Morphogenetic and Histogenetic Roles of the Temporal-Spatial Organization of Cell Proliferation in the Vertebrate Corticogenesis as Revealed by Inter-specific Analyses of the Optic Tectum Cortex Development

article-meta.related-article: A corrigendum on Morphogenetic and Histogenetic Roles of the Temporal-Spatial Organization of Cell Proliferation in the Vertebrate Corticogenesis as Revealed by Inter-specific Analyses of the Optic Tectum Cortex Development by Rapacioli, M., Palma, V., and Flores, V. body.p: One of the affiliations of Vladimir Flores was omitted in the original paper.

body.p: The correction does not affect the scientific validity of the results.

sec.title: Author contributions
sec.p: All authors listed, have made substantial, direct and intellectual contribution to the work, and approved it for publication.

sec.title: Conflict of interest statement
sec.p: The authors declare that the research was conducted in the absence of any commercial or financial relationships that could be construed as a potential conflict of interest
